name: Snapshot (itch)
description:
www.snapshotthegame.com

We love California: that's why we wanted to make a game dedicated to capturing the beauty of our state's mountain wilderness in a totally unique way. Snapshot is a one-of-a-kind photography simulator that aims to capture the experience of a perfect day of nature photography every time you play. Explore a beautiful nature reserve, unlock exciting new accessories for your camera and discover how fun photography can be.

  • Explore a beautifully rendered low-poly world inspired by the natural splendor of the Pacific Northwest
  • Learn real-world photography skills through a simulated digital camera
  • Get rich verbal feedback on your photos via AI-authored "comments" on your in-game blog
  • Dynamic music builds itself as you play and reacts to your surroundings in real-time
